trans-unit.source: Defines an endpoint that is authorized by a <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um ponto de extremidade que é autorizado por uma <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The EndpointPermission class defines a network endpoint, including host name, network port number, and transport type used to make the connection.
trans-unit.target: A classe EndpointPermission define um ponto de extremidade de rede, incluindo o nome de host, o número da porta de rede e o tipo de transporte usado para fazer a conexão.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Avoid creating EndPoint permissions using host names because these names will have to be resolved to IP address, which could block the stack.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Evitar a criação de permissões de ponto de extremidade usando nomes de host porque esses nomes terá que ser resolvido para o endereço IP, que pode impedir a pilha.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> is equal to the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o especificado <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref> é igual à atual <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para comparar com a atual <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref> is equal to the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref> é igual à atual <xref uid="langword_csharp_Object" name="Object" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Serve como uma função de hash para um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref:System.Object>.
Gets the DNS host name or IP address of the server that is associated with this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de host DNS ou endereço IP do servidor que está associado esse ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the DNS host name or IP address of the server.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome de host DNS ou endereço IP do servidor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the network port number that is associated with this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de porta de rede que está associado esse ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: The network port number that is associated with this request, or <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission.AllPorts"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de porta de rede que está associado esta solicitação ou <xref href="System.Net.SocketPermission.AllPorts"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o atual <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that represents the contents for the <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission> instance.
trans-unit.target: O método ToString retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o conteúdo para o <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission>instância.</xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission>

trans-unit.source: The string is in the form <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Hostname%2A> # <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Port%2A> # <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Transport%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres é o formulário <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Hostname%2A># <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Port%2A># <xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Transport%2A>.</xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Transport%2A> </xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Port%2A> </xref:System.Net.EndpointPermission.Hostname%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o atual <xref href="System.Net.EndpointPermission"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the transport type that is associated with this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de transporte que está associado esse ponto de extremidade.
